purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 29th Ada-Europe International Conference on Reliable Software Technologies (AEiC 2025), scheduled for June 10-13, 2025, in Paris, France. It highlights the early registration deadline of May 27, 2025, and provides details about the conference program, including tutorials, workshops, and social events. The email emphasizes the significance of the conference in promoting the Ada programming language and reliable software technologies, and encourages attendees to register early to benefit from discounted fees. It also mentions the venue, invited speakers, and various opportunities for networking and collaboration among participants.
